text: John Hawarde or Hayward (c. 1571–1631), of Tandridge Hall, Surrey was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Bletchingley in 1621 and 1624. He was a member of the Inner Temple and educated at Christ's College, Cambridge.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1604-1629/member/hawarde- john-1571-1631 ==References== Category:1570s births Category:1631 deaths Category:English MPs 1621–1622 Category:English MPs 1624–1625 Category:People from Surrey Category:Alumni of Christ's College, Cambridge
title: John Hawarde
